author: ceki
msg: - Changed VersionHelper.java to accomodate the case where teh system property java.version is null.
Also simplified the code a little.
- Changed MyCategory.java to use Category.log method.

msg: - After Paul's observation, removed the Category#getFQCN method.

author: ceki
msg: - Added the protected access getFQCN() method to Category class. The new method is used
extensively. Subclasses of category should override this method.
- Modified the MyCategory example to be easier to understand.
